  arch: win64
  args: /runWithoutUpdating /deelevated

  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:

    arch: win64
    name: winetricks

- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:

    executable: galaxy
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
